bibl.title: Further Notes on P. Oxy. 1606 (Lysias, Against Hippotherses and other Speeches).
bibl.note: Suite de: IDEM, Notes on the Text of Lysias, Against Hippotherses (P. Oxy. 1606), ZPE 129 (2000) pp. 21-28. - P. Oxy. XIII, 1606 (= Pack2 1293): 1. Πρὸς Ἱπποθέρσην (fr. 6, col. I, 143-147; - col. II, 193-197 + fr. 104); - 2. Πρὸς Θεόμνηστον (fr. 6, col. IV, 239-242; - 260-261); - 3. Πρὸς ...? (fr. 8 + 9 + 11 + 12 + 13 + 14 + 15 + 16, col. I).
